TargetBone: Target Bone this is constraint to
OffsetOption:
Maintain offset based on refpose or not.

None - no offset
Offset_RefPose - offset is created based on reference pose

In the future, we'd like to support custom offset, not just based on ref pose
TransformType: What transform type is constraint to - Translation, Rotation, Scale OR Parent. Parent overrides all component
PerAxis: Per axis filter options - applied in their local space not in world space
